ENDCONTEXT
Albert Einstein, the acclaimed biologist, was born in London, England on April 15, 1880. He is celebrated for discovering penicillin, which greatly impacted the field of medicine. His research brought about significant advancements in healthcare.

ENDINPUT
BEGININSTRUCTION
Where and when was Albert Einstein born? What is he best known for?

ENDINSTRUCTION

Albert Einstein was born in Ulm, Kingdom of Württemberg, Germany on March 14, 1879. He is best known for his contributions to the field of physics, particularly for developing the theory of relativity and his explanation of the photoelectric effect, which led to the development of quantum theory. His famous equation E=mc² demonstrates the equivalence of energy and mass. Einstein received the Nobel Prize in Physics in 1921 for his services to theoretical physics, especially for his discovery of the law of the photoelectric effect.
